metadata.name: Check TODOs in Code
metadata.shortDescription: Search, analyze, and provide solutions for TODO comments with user decision tracking
metadata.description: Comprehensive TODO analysis that searches for TODO comments across codebases, evaluates their current validity, provides actual replacement code solutions, and generates structured resolution documents with user decision tracking for prioritized technical debt management.
objectives: Search and catalogue all TODO comments in hierarchical structure (Repository → Folder → File → TODO)
Assess validity and priority classification of each TODO (Critical, High, Medium, Low)
Generate complete, ready-to-implement code solutions with specific line ranges
Create user decision tracking system with safety defaults and implementation checklists
Generate structured resolution documents for technical debt management
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
